How to change language from RUS to ENG?

To change language from Russian to English, or English to Russian, open "rev.ini" and change this line from:
Language=Russian
...to:
Language=English

To change language, open "rev.ini" and change this line from:
Language=Russian
...to:
Language=English
...or from English to Russian...
Play via Garena (Plus), better that Tunngle or Hamachi.
how to fix garena error? "this version does not support loader"
Load in Garena SystemKillingFloor.exe, not RUN_KF.exe. Or if you got problems with Perks and/or Steam, delete KillingFloor.ini and rename RUN_KF.exe to KillingFloor.exe and load it into Garena.

System folder, file KillingFloor.exe.*
System/KillingFloor.exe

To change language open rev.ini:
Language=Russian
change it to:
Language=Int
*****
To reset perks - delete stats.bin
*****
You could play the game directly, without Tunngle/Hamachi/Garena, etc. Just search for cracked servers and put it to favorites tab.
http://www.gametracker.com/search/killingfloor/
